text: (He nabika duvai patniharu) yadi timi duvai allaha samu tauba gardachau, bhane ramro cha kinaki nihsandeha timra hrdayaharu jhukisakechan ra yadi paigambara birud'dha timiharu eka apasama sahayoga garnechau bhane allaha usako sanraksaka cha, ra jibrila ra neka imanavalaharu pani, ra pharistaharu pani usako sahayata garnechan
